entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -38.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 03:54 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Temperature: -38.8°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.9°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:54 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
